snippet.title: Promise Mascot Agency: Release Date Trailer!
snippet.description:
We’re delighted to announce that Promise Mascot Agency is out on ✨April 10th, 2025!✨🥳

Join ex-yakuza legend Michi and his assistant manager Pinky☆ in their epic quest to restore glory to Kaso-Machi’s defunct mascot agency! Drive through the town in your upgradable trusty truck; recruit extremely peculiar, sentient mascots; negotiate their contract terms); and assign them to the best jobs to earn that cold hard cash!

But that’s not all, forbidden mysteries also lie in wait in this quite definitely cursed town - and at the centre of them all is you, Michi. Unravel the conspiracy to uncover the truth behind your exile and the debt hanging over your head.

Delve into the wonderful and bizarre world of Promise Mascot Agency this April on Steam, Xbox, PlayStation, Epic and Nintendo Switch!  

Wishlist the game to keep updated with all the latest news (and more importantly to make Pinky☆ happy)! 🙏 ✨

You can download the demo on Steam, Epic, PlayStation and Xbox:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2585830/Promise_Mascot_Agency/ 

PS5:
https://store.playstation.com/product/UP6440-PPSA27233_00-0249946431476665/

Xbox Series:
https://www.xbox.com/en-GB/games/store/promise-mascot-agency-demo/9PC42205125W 

Epic: 
https://store.epicgames.com/p/promise-mascot-agency-promise-mascot-agency-demo-85764f

🙏 WISHLIST NOW🙏 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2585830/Promise_Mascot_Agency/
Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/promise-mascot-agency-dd7a9c
PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10008195
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9p6gcj303k9b

Promise Mascot Agency is coming to PS5, Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch, Steam Deck and Windows in 2025 💖

⛩️ About Promise Mascot Agency ⛩️
From the creators of Paradise Killer comes an open world, mascot management, crime drama!
Be the boss. Turn a profit. Recruit and manage a chaotic roster of magnificent mascots!
Jump in your truck, and freely explore a forgotten (and cursed) Japanese town, where adventure awaits at every turn! Solve the mystery of your exile, unravel a wild conspiracy, and meet a host of truly eccentric characters along the way!

Follow Kaizen Game Works 💗
Website: https://kaizengameworks.com
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@kaizengameworks 
Promise Mascot Agency Reddit https://www.reddit.com/r/PromiseMascotAgency/
X / Twitter: https://x.com/KaizenGameWorks  
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/KaizenGameWorks 
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/kaizengameworks.com

#promisemascotagency #プロミスマスコットエージェンシー #yakuza #mascots #yakuzagame #indiegame #indiegames #game #releasedate
